Footer.caption: At RedNOx, our goal is to develop effective, sustainable, and durable solutions to agricultural challenges. We have developed and/or on a roadmap to demonstrate low-cost, in-field sensors for greenhouse gas emissions from soil in agricultural settings.

HomePage.title: Rednox
HomePage.heroDescription: Cut emissions, reduce compliance costs, and unlock operational savingsâ€”faster than regulatory deadlines

whyYouShouldCare.headline: Why you should care
whyYouShouldCare.description: NOx drives smog and acid rain; Nâ‚‚O has 298Ã— the GWP of COâ‚‚. One ppm you eliminate today stops both an air-quality fine and a greenhouse-gas penalty tomorrow.

HeavyDutyEngines.title: Heavy-Duty Engines
HeavyDutyEngines.description: RedNOx offers advanced sensor solutions for Heavy-Duty Engines, designed to meet the rigorous demands of upcoming regulations like the 2027 U.S. EPA & CARB

problemSection.headline: The Problem
problemSection.subheader: OEMs face the 2027 U.S. EPA & CARB 0.02 g/hp-hr NOx limit while customers demand < 1 gallon/h fuel-penalties. Current electrochemical sensors bottom out at ~50 ppm.

1.title: 1 â€“ 20 ppm detection with Â±10 % error
1.description: This keeps you inside warranty margins.

2.title: Plug-and-play ECU interface.
2.description: One harness, two CAN frames per second.

3.title: Heater-optimised ceramic stack
3.description: That reaches temperature in < 30 s â€” meets cold-start FTP.

4.title: Cloud API & dashboard
4.description: Trigger regen or urea-dosing only when needed, saving up to 5 % DEF.

list.1: Sensor bolts into the after-treatment slip joint.
list.2: Data flows via J1939 to the ECU (closed-loop) and via LTE to RedNOx Cloud.
list.3: Fleet manager views per-truck NOx intensity & fuel/NHâ‚ƒ trade-off curves.

Gensets.title: Gensets & Prime Power
Gensets.description: For stationary engines, continuous compliance and operational efficiency are paramount. RedNOx offers advanced sensing solutions for Gensets & Prime Power, designed to provide accurate, real-time NOx emission data. Our sensors help avoid costly shutdowns under Tier 4 Final rules by providing detection within a <10 ppm range. With plug-and-play integration into SCADA panels via Modbus-TCP and remote telemetry for proactive self-diagnostics, RedNOx ensures your operations remain compliant and optimized, even in remote locations.

1.title: < 10 ppm range
1.description: Avoids shutdowns under Tier 4 Final rules.

2.title: Modbus-TCP
2.description: Drops straight into most SCADA panels.

3.title: Self-diagnostics (heater impedance, Î»-drift) streamed upstream; schedule service before the light comes on.

2.title: Turns nitrogen savings into CARB LCFS or voluntary carbon credits.

3.title: Integrates with GPS-enabled spreaders

4.title: Annual subscription (SaaS)

workflowSection.2: Farm leverages live Nâ‚‚O + weather to trim side-dress passes.
workflowSection.3: Verified credit statement auto-generated at harvest.

Technology.title: The Science behind RedNox Product
Technology.subTitle: Learn about the sophisticated engineering and robust design that allows our sensors to provide unprecedented sub-ppm insight and enduring performance across diverse applications

1.howItWorks: A 250 Î¼m YSZ electrolyte is sandwiched between reference and sensing electrodes. At ~700Â°C, competing electro-catalytic reactions establish a mixed potential linearly proportional to NO + NOâ‚‚ partial pressure. The multilayer stack is screen-printed, co-fired at 1,300Â°C, and laser-trimmed for sub-ppm linearity.
1.whyItMatters: Solid-state construction shrugs off sulphur, oil aerosols, and thermal shock, delivering >10,000 h field life while outperforming legacy amperometric cells that bottom out near 50 ppm.

2.howItWorks: A nano-engineered catalyst layer accelerates the NOâ†”NOâ‚‚ redox pair while suppressing hydrocarbon cross-talk. A spiral heater etched under the sensing pad reaches 650Â°C in <30 s with <8 W draw.
2.whyItMatters: Fast light-off captures cold-start spikesâ€”critical for 2027 HD-FTPâ€”and the low power budget means the sensor runs straight off the ECU harness.

3.howItWorks: Dual RTDs embedded in the ceramic feed a 32-bit MCU that applies a 4th-order temperature polynomial every 50 ms. Auxiliary channels sample Oâ‚‚ and Hâ‚‚ to correct matrix effects in real time.
3.whyItMatters: Maintains Â±10% accuracy from â€“40Â°C to +125Â°C gas temps and across 0â€“20% Oâ‚‚, eliminating field recalibration cycles.

4.howItWorks: Each die is calibrated against NIST-traceable 0, 5, 10 ppm NOx blends. Calibration curves and heater signatures are stored in OTP memory and encoded in a QR on the shell.
4.whyItMatters: End-to-end traceability lets OEMs and fleets audit any sensor back to its raw data, simplifying ISO 9001 and regulatory reporting.

5.howItWorks: AgriNOx employs a dual-beam nondispersive IR setup: a narrowband MEMS IR emitter at 4.5 Î¼m, a long-life optical path, and a pair of thermopile detectors (sample & reference). Differential spectroscopy cancels humidity, COâ‚‚, and NHâ‚ƒ interference, while a micro-pump pulls a continuous soil-gas stream.
5.whyItMatters: Delivers < 100 ppb detection with <3 s response directly in soil plumes, enabling real-time nitrogen-use-efficiency mapping. Low-power (<2 W) operation plus LoRaWAN lets a small solar cell run the probe all season.

AboutRednox.title: About RedNOx
AboutRednox.headline: Reducing NOx, CO2 and N2O Emissions now
AboutRednox.subheader: RedNOx is a company that creates GHG emissions sensors. It combines advanced ceramic engineering with high-precision instrumentation to make selective and sensitive NOx, CO2 and N2O measurement platform. It has started several verification programs in collaboration with top automotive and agriculture companies.

whyRednox.title: Why RedNOx
whyRednox.headline: Breakthrough NOx Technology
whyRednox.subheader: Our platform can measure NOx and N2O greenhouse gases at the parts-per-billion level. Our goal is to provide sensor platforms to clean energy and alternative fuel engines around the world as quickly as possible. We are developing these sensors for use in various mobility areas. Our LoNOxTM high-temperature ceramics and N2O technologies can potentially reduce emissions to levels set by the EPA and CARB, while also lowering costs for engine manufacturers and farmers.

solomon.bio: Born in Uganda and grew up in Kenya as a war refugee. He co-founded SpiroSure, which had a $100 million exit to a multinational respiratory company in 2020.

dutta.bio: A world expert in sensor technology. He developed concepts for RedNOx technology in his lab at The Ohio State University.

markel.bio: A world expert in sensor technology. He is a systems engineering expert with Makel Engineering.
